title: Show me English: the appointment [episode 1]
creator_credit: Graeme Rowland, David Ferris, Trevor Lunn and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: A series of programmes which aim to help adult migrants communicate in everyday situations. Tina makes arrangements to visit her son’s teacher to discuss his progress. Home tutor program by the Adult Migrant Information Service.
